segments.text: Welcome to Jinyuan Shoe Town . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking for a pair of white sports shoes to go with my jeans .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: White ? What make do you want ? Arid what size ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Adidas ? They wear well . Try this pair , Size 38 , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . ( After trying ) A bit tight actually , they pinch my toes . Have you got a larger pair . Size 39 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( After trying ) Mm , this pair fits me well . I'll take it . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so lucky . They are on sale today . It costs only 250 yuan . Pay at the counter over there .
segments.speaker: S1
